extension.name: Featured Article (Task Meister)
extension.author: Fremont Teng
extension.description: A featured article module for Task Meister. Able to set video or image of an article.

field.name: articleID
field.label: Article ID (Not Automated)
field.description: Input your featured article id here.

field.name: videolink
field.label: Embeded Video Link (Not Automated)
field.description: Input your youtube link here. If left blank, the article image will be shown instead. Note that you have to use the embed format as such 'https://www.youtube.com/embed/mIYzp5rcTvU' rather than the normal watch youtube link like 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qiI9Wso3pDw'.

field.name: customtext
field.label: Custom Intro Text
field.description: Input your custom intro text here.

field.name: customheader
field.label: Custom Title (Not Automated)
field.description: Input your custom title here. Leave blank if you want to use the current article title.

field.name: automated
field.label: Automated
field.description: Sets if the recommendation is automated or not.
